name: Evalgator
description: Evalgator is an AI-powered platform for candidate assessment and recruitment. Major modules include an applicant tracking system, a comprehensive assessments module, and a collaborative coding interview module. Evalgator leverages AI, automation, and host of other robust features to simplify and speed up the hiring process while ensuring the integrity of assessments and quality of hires. For a platform packed with features, it is very user-friendly and affordably priced. Its versatility makes it an ideal solution for both technical and non-technical hiring as well other assessment needs.
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: All-in-one Talent Assessment Platform
ShortDescription: Hire the right talent with our digital assessment and evaluation platform.
enhanced_description: Evalgator is an AI-powered, all-in-one digital talent assessment and evaluation platform designed to simplify and speed up the hiring process while ensuring the integrity of assessments and quality of hires. Its major modules include a robust applicant tracking system, a comprehensive assessments module, and a collaborative coding interview module. Leveraging AI and automation, Evalgator supports diverse hiring needs such as campus recruitment, lateral hiring, and employee assessment, as well as pre-hire training and virtual lab environments. It offers versatility for both technical and non-technical hiring and other general assessment requirements, all within a user-friendly and affordably priced solution.
competitive_advantages: Simplifies and speeds up the hiring process
Versatile for both technical and non-technical hiring
roi_benefits: Potential cost savings due to affordable pricing
